welcome_message_body: "Welcome to L'Hay-les-Roses, a charming and picturesque city known for its beautiful parks and gardens. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer. Bon voyage!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mostly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password provided by your airline.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving a variety of international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into 7 sub-terminals serving a mix of international and domestic airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with limited access for basic browsing and email.
